body: Hi,  It must be something simple but I'm struggling to figure out why I cant seem to generate a proper Cumulative Sky Matrix cumulativeSkyMtx.  The image and the file should be pretty easy to read.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zMJxnqMJKq08tp2rwnMJo2efKGwTfwi-wMFipiC6C7LgAvGvrYZwZuSiYOKmKsGC4kruK28q0mKqq-n2BXh5fEt1Qya5**X7/ladybug_struggles.JPG)

replies.body: And the solution appears to be giving the workingDir_ input for cumulativeSky component to be the file path C:\Radiance\Bin\
Hi Nico, Happy to hear you found the solution yourself. Setting up working directory to any folder that you have full access to it should solve the problem. -Mostapha
